instructions: Locate and download the Vizio SmartCast app from either the Google Play store or the App Store, depending on your device. If this is your first time using the app, you'll need to pair it. Tap Devices > Add in the upper-right corner. You'll be prompted to hold your phone near the device for a short time. Once paired, tap the Control icon at the bottom of the screen. Tap Devices in the upper-right corner and choose your display from the list. Once selected, you can control the television as if your smartphone is the remote, from turning it on or off to controlling the volume, channel, aspect ratio, and much more.
